label: Hate_Speech
text: Ninte ammede pooru Ninte ammede thenga mairu

label: Hate_Speech
text: Pathala poor patti poori mon patty theettam

label: Hate_Speech
text: Poore ennayil tenni veetil poda Poori mone

label: Hate_Speech
text: Poottaavi poottile mathycurry poyi ninte kunna oombadaa

label: Hate_Speech
text: Pudti puliyadi Pulayadi monae pundachi mone

label: Hate_Speech
text: Ini nee paya virikkunnundenkil ath enikkayirikkanam

label: Hate_Speech
text: Ninnte undakkiya neram vazha vacha mathiyayirunnu
